title: Downloading Issues
body:
Hey guys,

Recently I posted an issue about having download issues where it would take hours and hours and still be at like 60%. Well today it actually managed to reach 89% (After 4 hours), then guess what happened? Unspecified error has occured, please retry. I clicked the retry and it went back to "33% scanning files".

....

Are you freaking serious right now?

How impossible is it to download this game?

Can someone help please? Thanks


Ab

replies.body: I was actually the one who replied to your last post. Did you work through all the steps in the [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) I provided last time in order to resolve this?
